translations: v．阐述，解释：详细说明或解释某个观点、理论或主题。
· The professor expounded the theory in his lecture.
教授在讲座中阐述了这个理论。

sentences.sentence: He expounded his views on the subject to me at great length.
sentences.translation: 他详细地向我阐述了他在这个问题上的观点。

sentences.sentence: Lawrence expounded on the military aspects of guerrilla warfare.
sentences.translation: 劳伦斯详细阐释了游击战的军事情况。

sentences.sentence: The writing background, intention and theme of the play Liberated Don Quixote expounded a philosophy.
sentences.translation: 从《解放了的董吉诃德》写作的时代背景，写作意图和主题看，该剧阐述了一个哲理。
